trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGULWHISTORY2_00893_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>The panel bears information on the history of the Milalla.

TEXT_REGULWHISTORY2_00893_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>(-Chapter II-)The Milalla are the keepers of a mighty relic passed down through the ages. While it has the appearance of a crystal, by whose hand it was wrought is unknown.
TEXT_REGULWHISTORY2_00893_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>(-Chapter II-)When a great calamity froze their isles, the Speaker, their spiritual leader, fervently prayed to the relic for salvation.

TEXT_REGULWHISTORY2_00893_SYSTEM_000_012<tab>(-Chapter II-)In answer to their prayers, the relic opened for them a golden path, one that shone like the light of dawn, and through it they fled unto a new land.
